title: Solomon Islands, Soramitsu team up for Bokolo Cash CBDC proof-of-concept
description:
The Solomons join tiny island nations worldwide at the forefront of CBDC development. Soc A new CBDC joins the very large crowd.

The Central Bank of Solomon Islands has launched a proof-of-concept for a central bank digital currency called Bokolo Cash.

Bokolo Cash will be worth one Solomon Islands dollar.

Wholesale transfers between commercial banks and simulated cross-border payments and remittances will also be tested. Users will undergo “two-tier” Know Your Customer verification, according to Soramitsu.

Related: Small Islands, big problems: Can Bitcoin fix this? Cointelegraph Cape Verde video

Bokolo Cash will operate locally on a tailor-made blockchain based on Hyperledger’s Iroha.

The project was initiated on Nov. Solomon Islands Prime Minister Manasseh Sogavare said:

Read more

title: SEC Challenges Slow Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA), As a Rising Token Targets Exceptional Gains Right Now
description: Delve into the captivating world of Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA) as they brave turbulent waters with the SEC, set against the backdrop of an up-and-coming token with bright prospects before 2024. Our in-depth analysis uncovers the twists and turns in their market journey, marked by legal entanglements of XRP and ADA and a rising token's ambitious stride towards remarkable gains. Stay at the forefront of the crypto sphere with our keen insights, unraveling the complex narratives and potential breakthroughs in this thrilling and ever-changing digital currency scene.

title: Hacker Demands Full Control Over Kyber in Wake of $47M Breach, Offers Executives Buyout and Staff Severance
description: A cybercriminal, who has been actively communicating with Kyberswap, issued a new onchain directive, this time insisting on “complete executive control over Kyber (the company).” This captivating onchain communication to the Kyberswap crew comes after the hacker’s initial request for the team to engage in more amiable and cooperative discussions. title: Hong Kong explores ICO as economic booster
description: Hong Kong is considering a bold new approach to rejuvenate its economy: the introduction of an Initial Coin Offering (ICO). This idea, first suggested by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Professional Association, has sparked lively debate among financial experts and policymakers. title: Binance launches the world’s first crypto triparty deal
description: Binance introduces a pioneering triparty agreement with a banking partner, offering a secure solution for institutional investors to manage counterparty risks in the crypto market.

title: Brazil’s New Bitcoin Tax Rules: Will a 15% Tax Impact the XRP Boom?
description: Brazil looks to introduce a new tax regime that may become effective by January 1. The new law may slow down the adoption of top assets like XRP. Brazil, a growing hub for crypto enthusiasts, is reportedly set to implement new XRP and Bitcoin (BTC) income tax rules that may reshape the ecosystem for digital [...]
